io.github.josephtaylor.marshal

Interface TransformationBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransformationBuilderImpl

    public interface TransformationBuilder
    The TransformationBuilder interface allows for transforming files and objects among data formats. It is designed to be used along side Marshal. Usage examples:

    marshal.transform("someFile.xml").from("xml").to("json").andSaveTo("someFile.json); marshal.transform(aJavaObject).to(DataFormat.JSON).getString();

    Supports the use of DataFormat objects to specify formats or their corresponding extension Strings.
